name: Forebearers
description: This city-building strategy game puts you as the chieftain of a tribe driven away from their homeland. Now you must rebuild and defend your tribe from both the elements and your old enemies.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / ATI Radeon HD 5850 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2.7 Ghz Quad Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
